section.name: Teaching a topic
section.summary:
Did you hear about the dyslexic devil worshipper? He sold his soul to Santa

Or maybe you heard about the dyslexic agnostic insomniac? He lay awake for hours at night wondering if there was a dog?

Well if you found those jokes entertaining, spare a thought for those we're mocking:

Dyslexia is a common learning difficulty that mainly affects the way people read and spell words.

This lesson was designed as part of an introductionto dyslexia, what it is, how to diagnose it and ways to support students who have it. (Other resources are in the School demo staffroom course)
